20110126051513.000|20110126051515.000|TR0|technology have transformed the way we 
20110126051515.000|20110126051517.000|TR0|live, work, and do business.  Steel mills 
20110126051517.000|20110126051520.000|TR0|that once needed 1,000 workers can now do

20110126052039.000|20110126052041.000|TR0|
20110126052041.000|20110126052044.000|TR0|Already, we're seeing the promise of 
20110126052044.000|20110126052046.000|TR0|renewable energy. Robert and Gary Allen 
20110126052046.000|20110126052048.000|TR0|are brothers who run a small Michigan 
20110126052048.000|20110126052050.000|TR0|roofing company. After September 11th, 
20110126052050.000|20110126052052.000|TR0|they volunteered their best roofers to 
20110126052052.000|20110126052055.000|TR0|help repair the Pentagon, but half of 
20110126052055.000|20110126052057.000|TR0|their factory went unused, and the 
20110126052057.000|20110126052059.000|TR0|recession hit them hard.
20110126052059.000|20110126052101.000|TR0|
20110126052101.000|20110126052103.000|TR0|Today, with the help of a government loan, 
20110126052103.000|20110126052105.000|TR0|that empty space is being used to 
20110126052105.000|20110126052108.000|TR0|manufacture solar shingles that are being 
20110126052108.000|20110126052110.000|TR0|sold all across the country.  In Robert's 
20110126052110.000|20110126052112.000|TR0|words, "We reinvented ourselves."
20110126052112.000|20110126052114.000|TR0|

20110126053136.000|20110126053138.000|TR0|To attract new businesses to our shores,

20110126053140.000|20110126053143.000|TR0|move people, goods, and information, from 
20110126053143.000|20110126053145.000|TR0|high- speed rail to high-speed Internet.   
20110126053145.000|20110126053147.000|TR0|   (APPLAUSE)
20110126053147.000|20110126053149.000|TR0|
20110126053149.000|20110126053151.000|TR0|Our infrastructure used to be the best, 
20110126053151.000|20110126053154.000|TR0|but our lead has slipped. South Korean 
20110126053154.000|20110126053156.000|TR0|homes now have greater Internet access 
20110126053156.000|20110126053158.000|TR0|than we do. Countries in Europe and Russia

20110126053200.000|20110126053202.000|TR0|than we do.  China's building faster

20110126053204.000|20110126053207.000|TR0|

20110126053953.000|20110126053955.000|TR0|decade ago.  And in the wake of the

20110126054006.000|20110126054008.000|TR0|over, we have to confront the fact that 
20110126054008.000|20110126054011.000|TR0|our government spends more than it takes 
20110126054011.000|20110126054013.000|TR0|in. That is not sustainable.  Every day,

20110126054024.000|20110126054026.000|TR0|
20110126054026.000|20110126054028.000|TR0|So tonight, I am proposing that, starting 
20110126054028.000|20110126054030.000|TR0|this year, we freeze annual domestic 
20110126054030.000|20110126054032.000|TR0|spending for the next five years.  Now, 
20110126054032.000|20110126054035.000|TR0|this would reduce the deficit by more than 
20110126054035.000|20110126054037.000|TR0|$400 billion over the next decade and will 
20110126054037.000|20110126054039.000|TR0|bring discretionary spending to the lowest 
20110126054039.000|20110126054041.000|TR0|share of our economy since Dwight 
20110126054041.000|20110126054043.000|TR0|Eisenhower was president.
20110126054043.000|20110126054046.000|TR0|
20110126054046.000|20110126054048.000|TR0|This freeze will require painful cuts.  
20110126054048.000|20110126054050.000|TR0|Already, we've frozen the salaries of 
20110126054050.000|20110126054052.000|TR0|hard-working federal employees for the 
20110126054052.000|20110126054054.000|TR0|next two years. I've proposed cuts to

20110126054116.000|20110126054118.000|TR0|already proposed deeper cuts, and I'm 
20110126054118.000|20110126054121.000|TR0|willing to eliminate whatever we can 
20110126054121.000|20110126054123.000|TR0|honestly afford to do without.  But let's 
20110126054123.000|20110126054125.000|TR0|make sure that we're not doing it on the 
20110126054125.000|20110126054127.000|TR0|backs of our most vulnerable citizens.
20110126054127.000|20110126054129.000|TR0|
20110126054129.000|20110126054132.000|TR0|(APPLAUSE)
20110126054132.000|20110126054134.000|TR0|
20110126054134.000|20110126054136.000|TR0|And let's make sure that what we're 
20110126054136.000|20110126054138.000|TR0|cutting is really excess weight.  Cutting 
20110126054138.000|20110126054140.000|TR0|the deficit by gutting our investments in 
20110126054140.000|20110126054143.000|TR0|innovation and education is like 
20110126054143.000|20110126054145.000|TR0|lightening an overloaded airplane by 
20110126054145.000|20110126054147.000|TR0|removing its engine.  It may make you feel 
20110126054147.000|20110126054149.000|TR0|like you're flying high at first, but it 
20110126054149.000|20110126054151.000|TR0|won't take long before you'll feel the 
20110126054151.000|20110126054153.000|TR0|impact.
20110126054153.000|20110126054156.000|TR0|
20110126054156.000|20110126054158.000|TR0|Now, most of the cuts and savings I've 
20110126054158.000|20110126054200.000|TR0|proposed only address annual domestic 
20110126054200.000|20110126054202.000|TR0|spending, which represents a little more 
20110126054202.000|20110126054204.000|TR0|than 12 percent of our budget.  To make 
20110126054204.000|20110126054207.000|TR0|further progress, we have to stop 
20110126054207.000|20110126054209.000|TR0|pretending that cutting this kind of 
20110126054209.000|20110126054211.000|TR0|spending alone will be enough. It won't.
20110126054211.000|20110126054213.000|TR0|
20110126054213.000|20110126054215.000|TR0|(APPLAUSE)
20110126054215.000|20110126054218.000|TR0|
20110126054218.000|20110126054220.000|TR0|The bipartisan fiscal commission I created 
20110126054220.000|20110126054222.000|TR0|last year made this crystal clear.  I 
20110126054222.000|20110126054224.000|TR0|don't agree with all their proposals, but 
20110126054224.000|20110126054226.000|TR0|they made important progress.  And their 
20110126054226.000|20110126054228.000|TR0|conclusion is that the only way to tackle 
20110126054228.000|20110126054231.000|TR0|our deficit is to cut excessive spending

20110126055731.000|20110126055733.000|TR0|
20110126055733.000|20110126055735.000|TR0|Brandon started a company in Berlin, 
20110126055735.000|20110126055737.000|TR0|Pennsylvania, that specializes in a new 
20110126055737.000|20110126055739.000|TR0|kind of drilling technology.  And one day 
20110126055739.000|20110126055742.000|TR0|last summer, he saw the news that halfway 
20110126055742.000|20110126055744.000|TR0|across the world, 33 men were trapped in a 
20110126055744.000|20110126055746.000|TR0|Chilean mine and no one knew how to save

20110126055748.000|20110126055750.000|TR0|
20110126055750.000|20110126055752.000|TR0|But Brandon thought his company could

20110126055801.000|20110126055803.000|TR0|equipment, and Brandon left for Chile.
20110126055803.000|20110126055806.000|TR0|

20110126055808.000|20110126055810.000|TR0|2,000-foot hole into the ground, working 
20110126055810.000|20110126055812.000|TR0|three or four hour -- three or four days 
20110126055812.000|20110126055814.000|TR0|at a time without any sleep.  Thirty-seven 
20110126055814.000|20110126055817.000|TR0|days later, Plan B succeeded, and the 
20110126055817.000|20110126055819.000|TR0|miners were rescued.
